# Reference

<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`rhsm`](#rhsm): Configure the connection to the RedHat Subscription Manager
* [`rhsm::proxy`](#rhsmproxy): Set an optional proxy for RHSM

## Classes

### <a name="rhsm"></a>`rhsm`

Set the org and activation key to establish a connection to the RHSM for the host.

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include rhsm
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `rhsm` class:

* [`activationkey`](#activationkey)
* [`enabled`](#enabled)
* [`manage_repos`](#manage_repos)
* [`org`](#org)

##### <a name="activationkey"></a>`activationkey`

Data type: `String`

activation key used to preconfigure RHSM subscription before system is registered

##### <a name="enabled"></a>`enabled`

Data type: `Boolean`

Enable/disable rhsm registration.

##### <a name="manage_repos"></a>`manage_repos`

Data type: `Boolean`

Enable/disable rhsm management of YUM repos.

##### <a name="org"></a>`org`

Data type: `String`

organization ID for RHSM subscription

### <a name="rhsmproxy"></a>`rhsm::proxy`

Set an optional proxy for RHSM

#### Examples

##### 

```puppet
include rhsm::proxy
```

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `rhsm::proxy` class:

* [`hostname`](#hostname)
* [`port`](#port)

##### <a name="hostname"></a>`hostname`

Data type: `String`

hostname of httpproxy that RHSM should use

##### <a name="port"></a>`port`

Data type: `String`

port of httpproxy that RHSM should use
